mapper.select: SELECT e.experience_id experienceId, e.experience_name experienceName, ei.image_size imageSize, ei.image_ext imageExt, ei.image_name imageName FROM experience AS e INNER JOIN experience_image AS ei ON e.experience_id = ei.experience_id GROUP BY e.experience_id ORDER BY e.create_date DESC LIMIT 0,3;

SELECT h.hotel_id hotelId, h.hotel_name hotelName, hi.image_size imageSize, hi.image_ext imageExt, hi.image_name imageName FROM hotel AS h INNER JOIN hotel_image AS hi ON h.hotel_id = hi.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_id ORDER BY h.create_date DESC LIMIT 0,3;
